Package vehicle

Class RegularManualTransmission

  • java.lang.Object
    • vehicle.RegularManualTransmission
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ManualTransmission
    public class RegularManualTransmission
extends java.lang.Object
implements ManualTransmission
    Represents a regular manual transmission vehicle where the speed changes by 1 at a time and supports exactly 5 gears, number 1 through 5.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RegularManualTransmission​(int l1, int h1, int l2, int h2, int l3, int h3, int l4, int h4, int l5, int h5)
      Constructs a RegularManualTransmission object.

      Decreases the speed of the vehicle by a unit of 1.

      Gets the current gear of the vehicle.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegularManualTransmission

        public RegularManualTransmission​(int l1,
                                 int h1,
                                 int l2,
                                 int h2,
                                 int l3,
                                 int h3,
                                 int l4,
                                 int h4,
                                 int l5,
                                 int h5)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a RegularManualTransmission object.
        Parameters:
        l1 - the low speed of gear 1
        h1 - the high speed of gear 1
        l2 - the low speed of gear 2
        h2 - the high speed of gear 2
        l3 - the low speed of gear 3
        h3 - the high speed of gear 3
        l4 - the low speed of gear 4
        h4 - the high speed of gear 4
        l5 - the low speed of gear 5
        h5 - the high speed of gear 5
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when any gear's low speed is greater than its high speed, when a gear's low speed is less than or equal to the previous gear's low speed, when a gear's low speed is greater than the previous gear's high speed, or when the first gear's low speed is not 0

      • increaseSpeed

        public ManualTransmission increaseSpeed()
        Increases the speed of the vehicle by a unit of 1. Increasing the speed is not possible if the vehicle has reached maximum speed or if the gear needs to be increased first.
        Specified by:
        increaseSpeed in interface ManualTransmission
        Returns:
        a new ManualTransmission
